args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: High Voltage Batteries May Short Circuit

Mack Trucks, Inc. (Mack) is recalling certain 2022-2024 Mack LRBE trucks.  The high voltage batteries may have loose hardware that can fall inside the battery pack and create a short circuit.A short circuit increases the risk of a fire.

Number of Units Affected: 10.0"
